full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BSTAN BSRUNG CHOS SKYONG CHEN PO DAM CAN RDO RJE LEGS PA 'KHOR DANG BCAS PA LA BRTEN PA'I SGO NAS GTOR BZLOG GI CHO GA BSTAN DGRA BDUD DPUNG CIG CAR 'JOMS PA'I RAB 'JIGS RDO RJE'I THOGS MDA' ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
